title: Fix Contact page Google Maps location and polish map section UI

requirements.summary: Ensure the Google Maps embed and outbound link always open the exact Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location using the provided canonical Maps link, with a safe fallback if the embed fails.
acceptanceCriteria: CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrl is updated to a valid Google Maps embed URL that shows the correct Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location (not a placeholder/incorrect coordinates).
On the Contact page, the iframe renders the correct location and the "Open in Google Maps" button opens the same correct location in a new tab.
If the embed fails to load (blocked/invalid), the Contact page remains stable and usable (no crash), and the user still has a working "Open in Google Maps" link.

file_operations.description: Update CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrl to a valid Google Maps embed URL that resolves to the same Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location as CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsLink, while keeping CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsLink exactly unchanged per constraints.

Harden the map embed rendering: add lightweight iframe error handling (no crashes on blocked/invalid embed) and ensure the outbound button uses CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsLink and an existing i18n key for its label so both map and button consistently target the same location.

requirements.summary: Polish the Contact page map/location section styling with refined spacing, card treatment, and a cleaner responsive map frame while keeping content unchanged and lightweight.
acceptanceCriteria: The map section on frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx has improved visual polish (e.g., refined Card styling, better padding/typography hierarchy, tasteful border/shadow, consistent rounding) while remaining fast to render.
The map iframe is presented in a cleaner frame (consistent rounded corners, subtle border/shadow) and maintains a responsive aspect ratio.
User-facing text remains in English (existing i18n keys continue to be used; no new hardcoded non-English strings are introduced).
No new heavy animation libraries/components are added; any motion is limited to subtle hover/focus states consistent with the existing Tailwind/shadcn styling.

file_operations.description: Improve the map/location section UI using existing shadcn-ui primitives (Card/Button) and Tailwind utility classes only: enhance spacing and hierarchy, apply subtle border/shadow and consistent rounding, and present the iframe within a cleaner responsive frame with only minimal hover/focus states. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
